name: Jam Prototype: Blitz Survival
description:
Survive rain of bombs with your wooden tank that can only shoot pebbles. How long can you endure?

Control:

WSAD/Arrow Keys: Movement

Mouse: Aim and shoot (hold left click)

Made for Quarantine Game Jam, with the theme: "A lot of..." -- and I decided to make a game about a tank surviving rains of bombs. While the game that I made has nothing to do with the virus, it is a representation of how I feel during this whole coronavirus pandemic: a weak shell of a wooden tank bombarded by bombs that representing the coronaviruses -- and the tank can only protect itself somewhat by avoiding the bombs somewhat or shooting its pebble shooters just like how we can only protect ourselves by reducing exposures and disinfecting our hands before the virus enters our body.

Enjoy :)
